page.title: 12MY DAY KIRSTIN AUTY AGED 9
page.content: I wake up at 7.00am and get up at 8.00,then I get dressed and have my breakfast of cereal,toast and orange juice.My mum takes me to school at 8.50.We all go on the back playground and come in at 9.00.Mr.Wood calls the register and we then go into assembly, where we sing a hymn and a teacher tells us a story.Then we say a prayer and go into the classroom and work at lessons.They are Maths which are addition,subtraction,multiplication and division.Or English where we do spelling or writing.We have a short break at 10.40 and then lunch at 12.00 I have a cooked meal at school.Then we have play until 1.30 when we go in and do some more work 'til 3.30 when we go home.After I get home I have a drink and watch T.V. or play.Then we have our family meal at 5.30 after which I watch T.V.before going to bed at 8.15.
